WorkItem.Description:
I get a system Unhandled Exception error when attempting to open an existing warrior character (saved from 2.2.10).
It is not recoverable and RAWR has to shut down.
Â 
**** edited issue to move error information to a text file ****
**** In the future please don't wall of text your error file ****
**** into the issue, put it into a separate file and attach ****
**** it instead ****

Comments.Message: Warr devs, please ensure that there is backward compatibility between minor versions of Rawr. This is just silly.

Astry: the previous issues opened for this with BrWarner and a couple others were using the updated code (the unreleased 2.2.11) so this new one is just a duplicate.

Larlew: To continue using the old data file, create a blank DPSWarr character and save the xml, then open the new xml and your old one and compare them side-by-side. You will notice that there is a larger list of true/false arguments in the new one. Copy the new to old and save. Now you should be able to load the character into Rawr 2.2.11+

Jothay, you should be able to do a simple bounds check before reading the maintenance XML.  If there's more than you're looking for, create a new array and copy the old contents to it.  Minimal perf hit.
